sdata.j: ↑一昔↑↓ひとむかし↓↑前↑↓まえ↓だったら、↑駅↑↓えき↓や、レストランや、↑病院↑↓びょういん↓の↑待合室↑↓まちあいしつ↓で|タバコ|に↑火↑↓ひ↓をつけるのをためらう↑人↑↓ひと↓はいなかっただろう。
sdata.e: At one time, people would not have hesitated to light up a cigarette in stations, restaurants, or hospital waiting rooms.

sdata.e: At first they think they won't come to harm, although no smoker escapes at least the short-term effects.
